scopes.name: $XSAPPNAME.Author
scopes.description: Author new lessons and edit them

scopes.name: $XSAPPNAME.Administer
scopes.description: Maintain files and configurations to keep app operational

scopes.name: $XSAPPNAME.View
scopes.description: View Lessons Learned as PowerPoint deck

role-templates.name: renee-Author
role-templates.description: Authors new lessons and edits their own lessons
role-templates.default-role-name: Author: Authorized to create and edit their own lessons

role-templates.name: renee-Curator
role-templates.description: Curates and publishes lessons assigned to them via their self-maintained areas of expertise

role-templates.name: renee-User
role-templates.description: Downloads PowerPoint decks of Lessons Learned
